name: WindCatcher
0:
”Alexa, open Wind Catcher”
”Alexa, ask Wind Catcher what it's like out there”
”Alexa, ask Wind Catcher should I go running”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wind catcher
des:
Now at v1.4!
Changes from v1.3:
- New server

Changes from v1.2:
- NEW! New icon.
- NEW! Users complained that Wind Catcher is inaccurate, so it now requires access to your full street address in order to get the most accurate weather results. Your address is geocoded by Google and Wind Catcher asks for the most accurate weather report at your little spot of heaven.
- NEW! Wind direction is now included! Provided by http://openweathermap.org.

Wind Catcher tells you if it's windy out today with a little personality. That's it. Runners, boaters, quadcopter pilots, and kite-flyers in the United States who want to know if it's windy before heading out can use this skill to find out, or just stand outside for a minute instead. 

Wind Catcher just reports the wind speed and direction near you, but in 75+ different ways. What you hear depends on how windy it is, what random number came up. and what phrases have been added at http://www.skillitz.me.

Wind Catcher does the same thing (report current wind speed and direction near your address) no matter what you ask it, but here are some of the 90+ ways you can launch it:
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher how windy it is
Alexa, tell Wind Catcher to get wind
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher for wind
Alexa, open Wind Catcher
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher to get windy
Alexa, tell Wind Catcher to search for wind
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher for the weather,
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher what it's like out there
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher if it's windy
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher if it's windy out
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher if it's windy today
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher what it's like today
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher how's the wind today
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher how windy is it
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher how fast is the wind
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher if it's windy right now
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher for the wind
Alexa, tell Wind Catcher to test the wind
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher for wind
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher do I need a hat?
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher will my hat survive?
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher to get me an accurate forecast
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher is it okay to go outside
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher is it okay to run
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher should I go running?
Alexa, ask Wind Catcher should I go jogging?

All weather data is provided by http://openweathermap.org.
Geocoding is provided by Google.
Original artwork provided by Melissa Easker (https://www.behance.net/melissapfingsten290a).
See https://sites.google.com/view/redalexa for more details.
